++ Application Signing

AS is a ContentSigning subclass for [Applications]. During the [Development] process, all [Users] who contribute to the development leave a signature with the [Applications]. This is interpreted by [Authoring] to provide communicative features. AS provides additional features with this information.

++Implementation

[Applications] in the SystemUniverse are uniquely identifiable.
    * [Developers] can be contacted by the remote component of the IssueSystem
